full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,PHYUGS KYI GOD KHA RIMS NAD SOGS KYI BSUR GYI ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(ZHES BSUR GYI MCHOD PA 'DI NI SNYIGS MA'I DUS SU RKANG BZHI PHYUG RNAMS LA YAMS NAD RIMS NAD SOGS NAD DANG, GOD KHA MANG DU 'BYUNG BA LA PHAN YON SNYOMS PA'I BSAM PA'I BSKUL TE, CES PA 'DI NI DZA YA PAndE BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAMS RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CING GYIS BRIN PA LA MA GYUR SEMS CAN THAMS CAD GNAS SKABS DANG MTHAR THUG ZHI PHAN DE'I DGE BA'I GYUR GYUR CIG , ,,AARTHA SIDDHI MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA'O,, ,,DGE'O, ,)
